WorkItem.Description: I love the application, it has definitely helped me with my gear choices. my issue is: When i try to run the optimizer for my tankadin i get the error "Object reference not set to an instance of an object". This only happens when i try to use the % to be crit <= 0.  if i don't have that filter the optimizer will work fine.  but the gear it chooses doesn't put me at the defense cap so it doesn't help me.

Comments.Message: Have you tried rebuilding your character file?

i did but it didn't help,  this is the exact error.

To enable just-in-time (JIT) debugging, the .config file for this
